topic.title: Can't Publish (Clean Install)
topic.body: As it says I was having issues publishing, did a clean download with only my users.json and still nothing. It signs everything fine but then I get the big 'ol red error that it can't be published. Is there a problem with the latest download? I've read reddit and github and I've tried both with and without tor enabled and didn't make a difference.

1600650663_14g2gXnsZdEPShFJkGdh5W3eGXmKz.body: One warning with this for those not in the know, but if you tick the Public DataFolder option to get your user.json instead of using the backup function it will break everything. It ends up creating a corrupted user.json. Unticking the option brings it back to normal. Merging will have to be done manually best I can guess as previously state but things like syncthing or whatever your preferred provider should be fine to sync the folder if you know how to access it without triggering the above bug.

1600682691_144CwRj8eynTUC9DtGHaNHR3wm9P2.body: It's working for me but I can't change my avatar like I could on mobile, keeps saying I don't exist or I'm muted.
